snippet: Vincent Legrend Walters disappeared after a drug-related murder in 1988. The authorities found him selling time shares to tourists in Cancún.
abstract: Vincent Legrend Walters, who disappeared after a drug-related murder in 1988, is arrested by Mexican authorities at the behest of the United States Marshals Service; Walters, who had eluded federal agents for decades, was found selling time shares to tourists in Cancun.
lead_paragraph: Vincent Legrend Walters disappeared after a drug-related murder in 1988. The authorities found him selling time shares to tourists in Cancún.

headline.seo: U.S. Drug Fugitive Walters Is Arrested in Cancún, Mexico
headline.main: Longtime American Fugitive Is Arrested Selling Time Shares at Airport in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Longtime American Fugitive Is Arrested Selling Time Shares at Airport in Mexico
